html:
Sir , bluntz
(I call you that cos I believe you a re a knight)
Pls speak in clearer terms...some of your followers are from other parts of the world where we sometimes can't relate to the statement or slangs being used
Pls..🙏

— Lao Mureli (@LaoMureli) December 24, 2023

4. We've reconfigured all our internal security parameters to remove SMS 2FA (PLS DO THIS!)

We still don't have access to the Twitter. Do not trust it.

If you have contacts within @X to help us escalate our case, please let us know 🙏 Would be a huge help.

— magmar | skip (🥧, 📈) (@0xMagmar) December 18, 2023
